Game.Name: GT Advance 2 - Rally Racing (USA)
Game.plot: More arcade then simulation. GT Advance 2 offers 15 rally cars, which you can tune, upgrade and modify between races, to be raced on 42 different tracks with varying weather conditions and road surfaces (tarmac, dirt, etc.) plus long corners, perfect for power sliding.By winning each race you unlock new cars to select, and upgrades to previous cars. Along with the championship mode, you can also race against the clock or a friend, and the ability to race for licenses by completing certain areas of tracks.Cheat: CodesEnter these on the title screen:Cheat: Unlock Expert Championship ModeTo unlock the Expert difficulty for the entire Championship mode, you must first complete the regular Championship mode with Gold on ALL tracks.Cheat: Unlock Expert Championship ModeTo unlock the Kart Extra mode normally, simply complete all the tracks of every class in Championship Mode.Cheat: Unlock Expert Championship ModeTo unlock the Wire Frame Extra mode normally, complete all the tracks of every class in Championship Mode, on the Expert setting.
